channel.title: When you die you dont lose objects
channel.description: hi ok well i got a new source and to make a long story short when you die you dont lose the items and i would like to lknow the easiest way to fix that. ty

you could create an area such as ‘safezone’ but make it like ‘keepitemzone’ or something like that… I don’t know the specifics…
